name: Fake Cast
description:
An attempt to use cellular automaton to create a competitive 1v1 game about casting. The idea was to force the player to use fake casting (inspired by World of Warcraft).

https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam2017

[WASD] Move [IJKL]

[Q] Damage [U]

[E] Shield [O]

[R] Mute [P]

The shield is mainly a fake target. Move to interrupt casting. Try to survive.

You can play with some cellular automata rules with [1-7]

(The sound had been shamelessly stoled to a song of Gang Gang Dance, it should change)
